      • urlToPdf

        public uk.co.terminological.rjava.types.RCharacter urlToPdf(String htmlUrl,
                                                            String outFile)
                                                     throws IOException
        Convert HTML from a URL to a PDF file. PDF size will be controlled by page media directives within the html.
        Parameters:
        htmlUrl - the URL
        outFile - the full path of the output file
        Returns:
        the filename written to (with extension '.pdf' if outFile did not have an extension).
        Throws:
        IOException - if the output file cannot be written

      • urlComponentToPdf

        public uk.co.terminological.rjava.types.RCharacter urlComponentToPdf(String htmlUrl,
                                                                     String outFile,
                                                                     String cssSelector)
                                                              throws IOException
        Convert HTML from a URL to a PDF file. PDF size will be controlled by page media directives within the html.
        Parameters:
        htmlUrl - the URL
        outFile - the full path of the output file
        cssSelector - the part of the page you want to convert to PDF.
        Returns:
        the filename written to (with extension '.pdf' if outFile did not have an extension).
        Throws:
        IOException - if the output file cannot be written

      • fileToPdf

        public uk.co.terminological.rjava.types.RCharacter fileToPdf(String inFile,
                                                             String outFile)
                                                      throws IOException
        Convert HTML from a local file to a PDF file. PDF size will be controlled by page media directives within the html.
        Parameters:
        inFile - the full path to an input HTML file
        outFile - the full path to the output pdf file. (N.B. this function can also output PNG if specified in the filename extension)
        Returns:
        the filename written to (with extension '.pdf' if outFile did not have an extension).
        Throws:
        IOException - if the output file cannot be written

      • stringToPdf

        public uk.co.terminological.rjava.types.RCharacter stringToPdf(String html,
                                                               String outFile,
                                                               uk.co.terminological.rjava.types.RCharacter baseUri)
                                                        throws IOException
        Parameters:
        html - the HTML string
        outFile - the full path to the output pdf file (N.B. this function can also output PNG if specified in the filename extension)
        baseUri - optionally the base URI of the HTML string for resolving relative URLs in the HTML (e.g. CSS files).
        Returns:
        the filename written to (with extension '.pdf' if outFile did not have an extension).
        Throws:
        IOException - if the output file cannot be written

      • fitIntoPage

        public uk.co.terminological.rjava.types.RCharacterVector fitIntoPage(String htmlFragment,
                                                                     String outFile,
                                                                     double maxWidthInches,
                                                                     double maxHeightInches,
                                                                     uk.co.terminological.rjava.types.RCharacterVector formats,
                                                                     double pngDpi)
                                                              throws IOException
        Render HTML string to fit into a page,
        Parameters:
        htmlFragment - a HTML fragment, e.g. the table element. It is usually expected there will not be any page media directives in the HTML
        outFile - the full path to the output pdf file (N.B. this function can also output PNG if specified in the filename extension)
        maxWidthInches - what is the maximum allowable width?
        maxHeightInches - what is the maximium allowable height? (if the content is larger than this then it will overflow to another page)
        formats - If the outFile does not specify a file extension then you can do so here as "png" or "pdf" or both.
        pngDpi - if outputting a PNG the dpi will determine the dimensions of the image.
        Returns:
        the filename(s) written to (with extension '.pdf' and '.png' if outFile did not have an extension).
        Throws:
        IOException - if the output file cannot be written

      • fitIntoA4

        public uk.co.terminological.rjava.types.RCharacterVector fitIntoA4(String htmlFragment,
                                                                   String outFile,
                                                                   double xMarginInInches,
                                                                   double yMarginInInches,
                                                                   uk.co.terminological.rjava.types.RCharacterVector formats)
                                                            throws IOException
        Render HTML string to fit into an A4 page,
        Parameters:
        htmlFragment - a HTML fragment, e.g. the table element. It is usually expected there will not be any page media directives in the HTML
        outFile - the full path to the output pdf file (N.B. this function can also output PNG if specified in the filename extension)
        xMarginInInches - page margins
        yMarginInInches - page margins
        formats - If the outFile does not specify a file extension then you can do so here as "png" or "pdf" or both.
        Returns:
        the filename(s) written to (with extension '.pdf' and '.png' if outFile did not have an extension).
        Throws:
        IOException - if the output file cannot be written
